extendedInfo.description: Pittsburgh Steelers News, Forum, Blog, Downloads, & Fan SiteSA is a premier independent fan site for all things Pittsburgh Steelers. A top rated Steelers site on Google, we pride ourselves in giving you the best in Steelers coverage 24/7/365. From training camp through the post season and all year around, SA is here to feed your Steelers addiction. We bleed Black 'N Gold just like you!Our forums are some of the best you'll find anywhere on the web, with great Steelers talk anytime you want it. We also have a top rated downloads pages for Steelers wallaper, buddy icons, user bars, and songs. Our weekly Blitzburgh Radio Steelers Podcasts keep you in the know with BlitzburghRockCity & Steeldad talking Black 'n Gold football. You can also catch player and media personality interviews on the show. That's just the beginning of what SteelerAddicts offers you and it's always FREE.This is our 2nd generation Android app and we're pleased to offer a host of new features:-View the latest Steelers News updated constantly.-Listen to podcasts right from the app-Log in and post in the SA forums-View the Steelers season schedule-Follow us on Twitter & get our latest Tweets-Keep up with our Facebook page-View our huge listing of Steelers Bars & Hangouts-Buy Steelers game tickets & merchandise-Read exclusive articles from our writers and affiliates.We're open to suggestions from the Steeler Nation so use the Contact Us option within the app and drop us an email on what you'd like to see added. Also if you notice any bugs, please let us know via email. We will reply back! Our goal is to make a user friendly, easy to navigate app with all the information you want & need!Please check out the app and consider giving us a 5 star rating!  Our previous app was approaching 10K downloads and now we're upping the ante with more features.

reviews.title: Captcoolhand
reviews.comment: Been coming to this site nearly since it first started. They put a lot of energy and time in providing a great site for true Steeler fans.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I frequently go to the website and thought this would be a great app. I noticed something new popping up about shopping deals in my area, traced it back to SA and  immediately uninstalled. If you love the Steelers and like to and like to shop this may be for you.
reviews.author: Greg Kuetemeier

reviews.title: Added extra app
reviews.comment: I loved this application until recently. Now I have this other stupid offers application that was added through this one. No way to turn it off and it jams up my phone every day. Drop that service and I will reinstall.
reviews.author: Jennifer Chace

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: After enjoying SA for quite a while, uninstalling because of the Make Geo Deals adware being pushed. This just started recently and can\'t be disabled from what I can tell. A shame. I liked this app up until now.
reviews.author: David S

reviews.title: Internet
reviews.comment: Says there\'s an internet connectivity problem and I have full wifi access. Shame. Used to be my favorite Steelers app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disapointed
reviews.comment: Very disappointed in the push ads... I am uninstalling b/c of this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dont waste your time
reviews.comment: Tried to open different links. Just showed a blank grey screen. Would be a great app if it actually worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just hangs
reviews.comment: Most links just hang and wont load.  Too bad..looked like a good app. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User
